title: Fred Biddlestone
text: Thomas Frederick Biddlestone (26 November 1906 – 1982) was an English professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>, best known for his time at <a href="Aston%20Villa%20F.C.">Aston Villa</a>. He signed for Villa from <a href="Walsall%20F.C.">Walsall</a>, and then played for <a href="Mansfield%20Town%20F.C.">Mansfield Town</a> before retiring.
